name: Dreamwalker
text: Psions who devote their full attention to lucid dreaming can fashion themselves a dream form capable of acting in the waking world, even while the psion remains conscious.

features.dreamingAdvantage(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to make a psionic attack, you gain combat advantage for that attack against any enemy adjacent to your dream form
features.manifestDreamForm(11thLevel): You gain the manifest dream form power
features.dreamingManifestation(16thLevel): When you use a psionic attack power that is an area burst, you can target one additional enemy that is outside the burst and adjacent to your dream form

flavorText: When I dream, I give a whole new meaning to the concept of sleepwalking.
